Adds multiple permissions to the permission builder.

## Import

```ts
import { PermissionBuilder } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### permissions

`Permission[]`

- The permissions to add.

## Returns

`this`
The permission builder instance.
